item.title: My Facination with Micro-Infrastructure and Mini-Cities
item.description: Often I find it hard to describe some of my weirder fascinations and hobbies. For examplem I find geodetic markers, strange geographical artifacts, and the math that links them fascinating.

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache License 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML, and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content.
